Room.Name: Main Street/Rosecrest Street Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Main Street and Rosecrest Street.
Room.LongDescription: Main Street continues to the north and south, and intersects Rosecrest Street, which runs east and west. To the north, you can start to see Nylandian Bay. The warm ocean breeze is quite refreshing. Rosecrest Street leads west towards the administrative buildings and north towards the Oceancrest Main Arena. South of Main lies the magnificent Oceancrest Memorial Fountain and one of the city's primary shopping districts.
